com.mttaboros.health.feed
Class FeedClient

java.lang.Object
  com.mttaboros.health.feed.FeedClient

public class FeedClient
extends java.lang.Object

Utility functions to support retrieval and creation of AuthSub secured atom feeds.

This version of FeedClient is java 1.4.2 compatible.

Author:
cb@mttaboros.com, az@mttaboros.com

getAtomFeed

public static com.sun.syndication.feed.atom.Feed getAtomFeed(java.lang.String authSubToken,
                                                             java.lang.String urlHref,
                                                             java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
                                                      throws AuthenticationException
Return an atom feed from the specified url using an AuthSub token and PrivateKey.

Parameters:
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
urlHref - the url of the atom feed
privateKey - the private key to sign the request
Returns:
the atom Feed from the specified url
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected

public static com.sun.syndication.feed.atom.Feed getAtomFeed(java.lang.String authSubToken,
                                                             java.lang.String urlHref,
                                                             java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                                                             boolean removeXmlnsFromEntries)
                                                      throws AuthenticationException
Return an atom feed from the specified url using an AuthSub token and PrivateKey.

Parameters:
removeXmlnsFromEntries - TRUE enables stripping xmlns attributes from the entry elements, FALSE disables it.
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
urlHref - the url of the atom feed
privateKey - the private key to sign the request
Returns:
the atom Feed from the specified url
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected

addEntry

public static com.sun.syndication.feed.atom.Entry addEntry(java.lang.String authSubToken,
                                                           java.lang.String feedHref,
                                                           java.lang.String title,
                                                           java.lang.String ccr)
Adds an atom Entry to specified remote atom feed

Parameters:
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
feedHref - the url of the atom feed
title - the title/subject of the new entry
ccr - the ccr or ccrg xml
Returns:
an atom feed Entry

Creates an atom feed with one entry that contains the provided ccr

Parameters:
title - the title/subject of the new entry
ccr - the ccr or ccrg xml
Returns:
the atom Feed from the specified url

getEntryFromFeed

public static org.jdom.Element getEntryFromFeed(com.sun.syndication.feed.atom.Feed feed)
                                         throws com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException,
                                                org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                java.io.IOException
Gets the entry from an atom feed that only has only has one entry.

Parameters:
feed - the atom feed to retrieve the entry Element from
Returns:
an element node of the entry in the feed
Throws:
com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException - if there is an error in parsing feed
org.jdom.JDOMException - if there is an error in building a Document
java.io.IOException - if error in writing/reading the request

buildAtomFeedFromEntryXml

public static com.sun.syndication.feed.atom.Feed buildAtomFeedFromEntryXml(java.lang.String entryXml)
                                                                    throws com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException,
                                                                           AuthenticationException,
                                                                           java.security.GeneralSecurityException
Wraps an xml entry with the atom feed namespace and creates a new atom Feed from it.

Parameters:
entryXml - a valid xml string that can be converted into a jdom entry
Returns:
an atom Entry
Throws:
java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if error in signing the request
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected
com.sun.syndication.io.FeedException - if there is an error in parsing feed

getResponseAsString

public java.lang.String getResponseAsString(java.lang.String authSubToken,
                                            java.lang.String url,
                                            java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
                                     throws AuthenticationException
Gets the response of the http request for an AuthSub secured atom feed as a string.

Parameters:
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
url - the url of the atom feed
privateKey - the private key to sign the request
Returns:
the atom Feed from the specified url as a string
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected

                                                           java.security.PrivateKey privateKey)
                                                    throws AuthenticationException
Gets the response of the http request for an AuthSub secured atom feed as an InputStream.

Parameters:
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
url - the url of the atom feed
privateKey - the private key to sign the request
Returns:
the response from the specified url as an InputStream
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected

postDataAndGetResponseAsInputStream

public static java.io.InputStream postDataAndGetResponseAsInputStream(java.lang.String authSubToken,
                                                                      java.lang.String urlHref,
                                                                      java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
                                                                      java.lang.String data)
                                                               throws AuthenticationException,
                                                                      java.security.GeneralSecurityException
Posts data to a specifed AuthSub protected url and gets the repsonse as an InputStream.

Parameters:
authSubToken - the AuthSub token to use in the request
urlHref - the url of the atom feed
privateKey - the private key to sign the request
data - the data to post to the feed url
Returns:
the response from the specified feed url as an InputStream
Throws:
AuthenticationException - if the token is rejected
java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if error in signing the request
